name: Mesmerised Store
description:
Mesmerized Shop Made in 10 days from scratch using Blender and Godot Engine for the "Jamcraft4" game jam.

Contributors:

  • PhantomPharaoh#2422
  • _Vinyoo_#4024 
  • Giuliano De Pian <- our amazing composer(Link to his YouTube)

The game's purpose:

In the game you take the role of a witch who runs a magic store. During the game costumers will come and ask for an item, then you have to collect the ingredients around the house and put them in the cauldron to craft it. For each costumer you serve you get points and at the end of the day you can boast about your high score count or idk...

Join our Discord Server!
